styletoken.token1.backgroundColor.markdownDescription: Background color in `hex`. To set opacity, use a period `.` followed by the percentage `0 - 100`

styletoken.token1.borderColor.markdownDescription: Border color in `hex`. To set opacity, use a period `.` followed by the percentage `0 - 100`

styletoken.token1.borderWidth.markdownDescription: Border width in `px`. Can also set the location in which they appear `top right bottom left` e.g. `0 0 1px 0`

styletoken.token1.borderStyle.markdownDescription: Sets the style of the border

styletoken.token1.overviewRulerColor.markdownDescription: Color of the indicator in the scrollbar. To set opacity, use a period `.` followed by the percentage `0 - 100`

styletoken.token1.overviewRulerLane.markdownDescription: Sets the location of the indicator.

styletoken.token1.isCaseSensitive.markdownDescription: Option to turn on/off case sensitivity
